definition: to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: RU Shu-hua is an outstanding educator in the history of Chinese higher education.
sentences.chinese: 胡庶華是我國近現代一位傑出的教育家。

sentences.english: Many educationists think highly of the aesthetic education and try their best to advocate it.
sentences.chinese: 許多教育家都重視美育，不遺餘力地提倡美育。

sentences.english: Wu yannan is a famous educator in Guizhou.
sentences.chinese: 吳雁南是貴州著名的教育家。

sentences.english: Confucius was a great ideologist and educator in ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 孔子是我國古代偉大的思想家和教育家。

sentences.english: Sukhomlynsky is a great educator of the former Soviet Union.
sentences.chinese: 蘇霍姆林斯基是前蘇聯一位偉大的教育家。

sentences.english: Hungarian renowned music educator Kodaly pointed out that singing is the root of music.
sentences.chinese: 匈牙利著名音樂教育家柯達伊指出，歌唱是音樂之根。

sentences.english: Jaspers was a famous humanism educationist of Germany in the 20 th Century.
sentences.chinese: 雅斯貝爾斯是20世紀德國著名的人本主義教育家。
美籍匈牙利鋼琴家，教育家。

sentences.english: He was a french historian and pedagogue.
sentences.chinese: 他是法國曆史學家和教育家。

sentences.english: China educator Tao Xingzhi thinks that life is education.
sentences.chinese: 我國教育家陶行知認爲生活即教育。

sentences.english: Li Shutong is an illuminative music educator in modern China.
sentences.chinese: 李叔同是我國近代著名的啓蒙音樂教育家。

sentences.english: I think that my parents are both good educators.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲我父母都是好的教育家。

sentences.english: Just as the famous educator Confucius said, there is no class discrimination in education.
sentences.chinese: 正如著名的教育家孔子所說的，教育是不分階層的。

sentences.english: The name of the Ma Ling Mountain House was the inscription by Cai Yuanpei, a great educator and then president of Beijing University.
sentences.chinese: 別名“馬嶺山房”是北大校長教育家蔡元培題寫的。

sentences.english: Tang Wen-zhi was a famous educationist in the Modern History of Chinese Higher Education.
sentences.chinese: 唐文治是中國近代高等教育史上著名的教育家。

sentences.english: Educationalists say that generation gap is a source of complaints from both parents and children.
sentences.chinese: 教育家們說父母們和孩子們都在抱怨“代溝”現象。

definition: Tao Xingzhi (1891-1946), Chinese educator and reformer
scholar of the rationalist school of Neo-Confucianism 理學|理学[Li3 xue2]
jurist/member of the pre-Han legalist school
